entry.title: Axis Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 95.00

Our signature Axis Sports Bra is the new racerback silhouette. Inspired by the bound details of boxing wraps, this sports bra features contrasting matte and gloss ‚ wrap detailing which adds a new level of support. This performance bra has removable cups, built-in mesh lining for breathability, an elasticated hem and bonded seams for a smooth seamless feel. Suitable for high impact activities.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small

Main: 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane, Gloss: 79% Polyamide 21% Elastane

entry.title: Axis Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 95.00

The mahogany colour is back. This new racerback silhouette is inspired by the bound details of boxing wraps and it features contrasting matte and gloss ‚ wrap detailing which adds a new level of support and comfort. This performance bra has built-in inner mesh lining for breathability, an elasticated hem band for support and bonded seams to help you feel comfortable and confident during your next workout. Suitable for low-mid impact activities.

Model is 5'11, waist 24" and wears size small

Main: 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane, Gloss: 79% Polyamide 21% Elastane

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 55.00

Super soft white Technical Knit Sports Bra (without removable bra cups) with a scoop front neckline and racer back finish. Features ventilation mesh panels under bust and back chest, with added support of compression knit lining to give you support where you need it. Suitable for low to medium impact activities. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 55.00

Super soft black technical knit sports bra with removable bra cups, sustainably made in Europe with Qnova recycled yarns. A scoop front neckline and racer back finish, features ventilation mesh panels at the under bust and back chest, with added support of compression knit lining to give you support where you need it. Suitable for low to medium impact activities. This bra is made from 91% recycled Qnova Polyamide, 9% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Racer Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

The Sierra geometric print is carefully placed on the racer bra to flatter the bust while the bronze technical taping shapes the racer-back design. Merging performance and style, this piece is made in Italian fabric with mesh ventilation panels to enhance breathability for your workout. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 25.00

This super-soft racer back sports bra adds a new level of comfort for low-intensity workouts. Designed in fabric that is fits like second skin yet is very breathable. This rich Maroon colour offers an alternative to your everyday black. Made from 94% Polyamide, 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

This bra is a silhouette-enhancing design that offers a supportive lift. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Flux Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

This sleek, racer-back sports bra is adorned in high-gloss technical taping that not only supports but contours the female form. Crafted from Italian fabric and an elasticated hem to ensure unrestricted yet supported movement. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane. 

Model is 5'11  / 182cm, waist 24 / 61cm, hips 34 / 86cm and wears size small

entry.title: Racer Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

SHOP THE LOOK

Our design team have pushed the boundaries on design and performance by using a new print process to achieve this luxury metallic finish. Made with a racerback shape and mesh ventilation at the front and back. This sports bra has removable bra cups. Due to the nature of the print process the pattern will vary slightly on each sports bra. Made from MAIN: 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane. MESH: 80% Polyamide/ 20% Elastane

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Aircut Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 75.00

Super-soft and flattering racer back sports bra with cross over v-neck design.

Suitable for low to mid-intensity workouts such as yoga, Pilates and cycling. Featuring internal lining and elasticated hem. Quick dry and moisture wicking fabric made from fully lined 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane

Model is 5'10, bust 32" and wears size small. The hem band on this style is small. Please size up.

entry.title: Technical Knit Adjustable Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 50.00

Seamless knit sports bra in black boasts a flattering neckline and removable cups that provide comfort and extra coverage. The adjustable straps ensure the perfect fit and can be work straight or crossed over at the back. The bra features a ribbed hem and ribbed knit lining for comfort and support. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

Super-soft and flattering racer back sports bra with cross over v-neck design. Suitable for low to mid-intensity workouts such as yoga, Pilates and cycling. Featuring internal lining and elasticated hem. Quick dry and moisture wicking. Pair with Performance V2 leggings in Marine for the full set. Also available in white. This bra is fully lined and made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane
